org.apache.james.mailbox.hbase

Interface HBaseNames


  • public interface HBaseNames
    Contains table names, column family names, qualifier names and other constants for use in HBase. Each qualifier in the META column will begin with a short prefix that will determine it's purpose.
    Qualifier prefix meaning:
    • m: meta information;
    • sf: system flag (DELETE, RECENT, etc.)
    • uf: user flag
    • p: user property
